Description: Your satisfaction is our number one goal. Keep in mind that we offer hassle-free returns if needed. If you have any questions or problems, please contact us. Please Note: All included items are shown in the pictures 24223000564 Features: The Epiphone Explorer-GT Electric Guitar has the famous futuristic body design with a cool worn black finish and black hardware, including a LockTone Tune-O-Matic bridge and stopbar tailpiece for more sustain and easier string changing, and sealed die-cast tuners. Other features include a mahogany body and a 24-3/4' scale slim-taper hard maple neck for the kind of sustained tone and playability you need. The Epiphone Explorer-GT is also loaded with a 650R Alnico humbucking neck pickup and a 700T Alnico humbucking bridge pickup for a variety of great classic tones. The master tone control has an innovative integrated killswitch/tone pot.
